experience: You and Adrian both know Trish Bear, Aaron D. Bare, and 30 others

Bikini.com is a Las Vegas-based swimwear ecommerce and lifestyle website, selling high-end swimwear products and creating engaging millennial-focused content through owned and earned digital media channels.Accomplishments-Manage in-house and vendor resources for execution of paid, earned, and owned digital media strategy.-Drive SEO audit and implementation plan, resulting in 70% YoY growth for Organic Search.-Introduce Paid Display partners that delivered 2X over target ROAS.-Train and manage internal resources on PPC, Display, Social Media and Email channel execution.-Manage technology platforms and development teams for Shopify Plus and Drupal on LAMP stack.-Develop Analytics systems to monitor ecommerce sales, attribution, and inventory movement using Google Cloud, Stitch, Tableau.-Develop media kits to solicit advertising opportunities.

Internet Marketing Inc. is one of the fastest growing full service Internet marketing agencies in the country with offices in San Diego and Las Vegas.  We specialize in providing results driven integrated online marketing solutions for medium and large businesses across the globe. Accomplishments-100% annual departmental growth attributed to increased Analytics service revenue for the past 2 years.Development of new service offerings for additional revenue streams in the areas of Technical Web Analytics, Reporting & Automation, and Conversion Rate Optimization.-Department-level budget and resource management.-Implementation, training, and hands-on use of solutions such as Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, Google BigQuery, Tableau, Python, Convertro, AWS, Optimizely, Google Search Console, Doubleclick, AdWords, Bing, Facebook, and other digital marketing &  analytics tools.-Prominent role in new sales and business development.-Remote management of employees across San Diego, Las Vegas, and other US locations.-Responsibility in improving IMI’s brand awareness by speaking at industry conferences.

IO, the leading provider of next-generation modular data center technology and services designs, engineers and delivers cloud enabling data center infrastructure and software for the world's largest enterprises, governments and service providers.Accomplishments-Employee and vendor management for execution of SEO, PPC, Social Media, Web Development and Content strategies.-Hands-on work and deployment in all digital marketing areas. -Creation and implementation of new product marketing content.-Successful product marketing deployment for new IO.Cloud service. -20% YoY growth in contract opportunities from digital marketing campaigns. -Strategic management of annual digital marketing budget. -Operational analysis and review of overall marketing budget across digital, field, creative, corporate communication areas. -Revamped reporting and analytics integrations across Google Analytics, CRM, Marketo and ad networks. -Managed new responsive website development project powered by WordPress and integration with external systems. -Led technical implementation of Marketo marketing automation suite. -Partner with Sales for lead flow and sales process collaboration.
Alumni of the ASU Herberger Institute for Design and the Arts

recommendations: Chief Marketing Officer at BRANDish Social Media Marketing | #NotAGuru, Maven, Ninja or Rock Star
March 18, 2014, Vincent reported directly to Adrian

"An exemplary leader and manager, possessing an intricate knowledge base of his chosen field, who is not afraid to tackle any and all challenges in his pursuit of excellence and progress." This is how I would describe Adrian Vender in a managerial capacity. It’s not the dictionary definition, but it does define the person that I experienced during my time with IO Data Centers. There is no one more thoughtful, detailed, and concise than Adrian when it comes to mapping out a plan or a strategy. It always amazed me how he was able to handle any situation (task or people-related) with swift yet precise consideration.I’m not a purveyor of hyperbole, so take this next statement for what it’s worth: Adrian is on my Mt. Rushmore of managers I’ve had in my career. He always had a method for moving forward on things, yet he would still be open to utilize any ideas that would improve the overall results. That is a delicate balance to not only implement but also to maintain, and Adrian seemed to do so effortlessly and naturally. In short, Adrian adds value to any company smart enough to bring him into the fold.

summary: Adrian is a seasoned (10+ years of digital), industry-recognized marketing strategist, with a heavy emphasis on digital/interactive marketing and analytics. Adrian enjoys merging a highly operational/technical background with a passion for results-driven marketing campaigns. Adrian also has a love for teaching and mentoring, which involves speaking at industry conferences and educating people in the office.Responsible for developing and optimizing marketing and branding campaigns across digital marketing (paid and organic search, display, social media, email), field marketing and corporate communications channels. Devoted to developing highly-engaging storytelling through web and interactive media. Implementation and management of lead generation and nurturing strategies with marketing automation tools. Diligent focus on Analytics strategies to provide operational validation and guidance for overall marketing efforts. Overall, Adrian is dedicated to successfully establishing sustainable processes to get customers 'To'​ and 'Through'​ your business.Most importantly, Adrian is a team-focused manager and strives to leverage everybody's unique abilities and traits to achieve individual and organizational success.Notable Speaking Accomplishments:MozCon 2015MozCon Ignite 2016eMetrics Chicago 2016ERA Great Ideas Summit 2016SMX West 2012, 2015SMX East 2011, 2014IMA Impact 2014Content Marketing World 2014Interactive Day San Diego 2014Instructor for Cardinal Path Training Academy (2009-2012)Specialties: Speaking, Web analytics, Google Analytics, SEO, SEM/PPC, Marketo, Marketing Automation, Conversion Optimization, PHP, MySQL, AJAX, HTML/CSS, jQuery
